subtasks.subject: Research & Analysis
subtasks.description:
## Research Tasks
- Analyze existing code patterns
- Research best practices
- Identify potential challenges
- Document findings

## Deliverables
- Technical analysis document
- Recommended approach
- Risk assessment

subtasks.subject: Implementation
subtasks.description:
## Implementation Tasks
- Write core functionality
- Follow coding standards
- Make incremental commits
- Handle edge cases

## Deliverables
- Working code
- Unit tests
- Clean commit history

subtasks.subject: Testing & Validation
subtasks.description:
## Testing Tasks
- Write comprehensive tests
- Validate acceptance criteria
- Performance testing
- Edge case testing

## Deliverables
- Test suite
- Test results report
- Performance metrics

subtasks.subject: Documentation
subtasks.description:
## Documentation Tasks
- Update API documentation
- Create usage examples
- Update README/wiki
- Add inline code comments

## Deliverables
- Updated documentation
- Usage examples
- Changelog entry
